alert.note: Alert for Extreme Western Allegany (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 2:55PM EST until December 23 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM FRIDAY TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy mixed precipitation; additional snow accumulations of less than one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected; wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow and blowing snow expected; total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, winds gusting as high as 60 mph, and visibility less than a half mile at times. * WHERE...Extreme Western Allegany County. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 6 PM EST this evening. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 AM Friday to 10 AM EST Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM to 6 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes, as well as holiday travel. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines, resulting in numerous power outages. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...For the Wind Chill Warning, the highest wind speeds will be Friday into Friday evening. Near blizzard conditions are possible. Affects from the extreme cold could be made worse due to power outages.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
